wikipedia_page.main: Courtney Alister Meppen-Walter (born 2 August 1994) is an English professional footballer who plays for Radcliffe as a defender. He previously played for Carlisle United.

response: Williams and teammate Courtney Meppen-Walter were both released by Telford on 12 May 2021, following the expiry of their contracts. Williams scored 12 goals in 43 National League North appearances for the Shropshire side.

In November 2011, Blackett was called up to the England U18 squad for a friendly against Slovakia. On 16 November, he started the 1–1 draw with Slovakia, before being replaced by Courtney Meppen-Walter in the 65th minute. He retained his place in the squad for the friendly against Poland in February 2012, coming on at half-time as England won 3–0 at the Alexandra Stadium.
